text:
including hypnosis, LSD, and other forms of psychological manipulation.

The MKUltra program was shrouded in secrecy, with many details only coming

to light decades later. The CIA's primary goal was to develop techniques for

controlling human behavior, particularly in the context of interrogation and

counterintelligence. However, as we delve deeper into the world of MKUltra

conspiracies, it becomes clear that the true extent and motivations behind this

program are still shrouded in mystery.
